Mobile: Dash at full speed in difficult terrain, no OA from targeted foe
Monk Bonus Attack: Unarmed strike after monk weapon attack
Mounted Combatant: Adv unmounted foe smaller than mount, redirect attack on mount to self, mount takes no damage on Dex save, half on fail

Perfect Self: Min 4 Ki after initiative

Sun Shield: 7 HP radiant damage to foe when hit w/melee attack
Touch Of Death: R5' Taking foe to 0 HP gives self 22 temporary HP
